locationFields.directionssouth: From the South (Carmel / Indianapolis): Take US-31 North and exit onto IN-32 toward Westfield. Turn right onto East State Road 32 — RELUXE is just ahead on your right, before you reach downtown Westfield.
locationFields.directionsnorth: From the North (Noblesville / Sheridan): Head south on US-31, then take the IN-32 exit toward Westfield. Turn left onto East State Road 32. RELUXE is located just before downtown Westfield, on your right.
locationFields.directions465: From I-465: Take US-31 North from I-465. Exit onto IN-32 West toward Westfield. Turn right on East State Road 32 — RELUXE will be on the right just before you enter downtown.

faqs.question: What are you near?
faqs.answer: We are just off US 31 on US 32 right next to Birdies!

faqs.question: How long have you been in business?
faqs.answer: We opened in December of 2023 at Westfield location.

staffFields.staffBio:
Shannon is the friendly face you’ll see when you walk into RELUXE Westfield. She loves greeting guests with a big smile and making sure every visit starts off on the right note. Whether she’s helping you check in, booking your next appointment, or recommending her favorite skincare must-haves, Shannon brings warmth and energy to the front desk.

Outside of the spa, Shannon is a big fan of TikTok trends and always keeps the team in the loop with what’s new and fun online. She makes sure RELUXE stays just as current and welcoming as the community we serve.

Alexis is a skilled and compassionate cosmetic injector with a passion for helping clients look and feel their best.

She takes a personalized approach to every appointment, ensuring that each treatment plan is tailored to her client’s unique goals and facial anatomy. Known for her gentle touch and attention to detail, Alexis creates natural, refreshed results that enhance her clients’ confidence. Whether you’re new to injectables or a seasoned pro, you’ll feel comfortable and cared for in Alexis’s hands.

Laci Gongwer is a dedicated and skilled Licensed Esthetician with expertise in delivering personalized skin care treatments and fostering positive client experiences. With hands-on knowledge of advanced procedures, including Signature Facials, Hydrafacial, and chemical peels, she specializes in addressing diverse skin concerns and enhancing client confidence.

Anna has joined the medical staff at Reluxe Med Spa with over half a decade of experience in the corrective skin care industry. She began her career as an aesthetician, attending the Aveda Fredric’s Institute and graduating with Honors at the top of her class. With a background in the beauty industry and her passion for advancing her knowledge of various skin care therapies, she offers a collaboration of relaxing experiences with driven results in her treatments. Anna is highly trained and certified with various lasers, micro-needling, chemical peels, custom facials, dermaplane and more. She is always furthering her education and training to stay up-to-date with the latest technology and products in an ever-advancing field.

In her late teens, Anna developed hormonal cystic acne. She turned her experience with it into an ambition and specialty for helping others struggling with acne, rosacea, and sensitive skin. Her favorite part of being an aesthetician is helping others feel confident and beautiful in their own skin. Her ability to connect with people creates a relaxing and safe environment for all her patients. She works closely with her patients to develop personalized treatment plans and product regimens that address and correct their unique skincare concerns.

When she is out of the office, Anna enjoys spending time with her family, friends, and her dog. She is also an avid reader and is always enjoying new books. She loves listening to music and is always on top of new Pop-culture shows, moments, and more.

If you want to improve your skin’s appearance or simply want to educate yourself on the best products, Anna’s got you covered. Her expertise and dedication will help you achieve the glowing, healthy skin you deserve.

Hannah is a registered nurse with expertise in aesthetics and a passion for building patient relationships. She started her career in the ICU after earning her Bachelor in Science. Hannah discovered her interest in aesthetic medicine after moving to Texas in 2020. It was during this time that she immersed herself in educational courses about neuromodulators and fillers, beginning her career as an aesthetic injector.

Hannah has a passion for helping others look and feel their very best through individualized treatment plans. She has an eye for facial balancing allowing her to provide highly desired results safely and effectively. Hannah finds balance in the science of nursing as well as the art of aesthetics to help patients achieve their goals and gain self-confidence.

In her free time, Hannah loves to travel and spend time with her husband and Goldendoodle, Finn!

staffFields.stafffunfact: She saved a guy on a flight.
staffFields.staffBio:
Krista is a Carmel local and graduated from CHS in 2008. She is now a Master’s prepared Nurse Practitioner with expertise and passion for aesthetics. She completed her Bachelor of Science in Nursing with a minor in Nutrition while playing 4 years of collegiate volleyball at the University of Southern Indiana. Krista then began her nursing career in the Cardiac Intensive Care Unit, working for 7 years while completing her Master’s degree. After passing her NP certification, she worked inpatient for 4 years, specializing in cardiology-electrophysiology for 2 years and, most recently, pulmonary critical care.

Krista began her aesthetic career in early 2023 as a nurse practitioner injector after completing a certification course with hands-on experience at the highly accredited National Laser Institute in Scottsdale, Arizona. She then started her own successful concierge injectable business, Shea Aesthetics. She continued to work fulltime as a critical care nurse practitioner while growing her business, client list and gaining experience. In the winter of 2023, she followed her aesthetic passion and pursued her dream of working full-time at Reluxe Med Spa. Continuing education is very important to Krista. She loves exploring new products and learning new techniques to bring the most up-to-date treatment options to the area.

Krista is happy to be living where she grew up. She is married to her husband, Jordan, and has two children. Her community is important to her. When not at work, she enjoys spending time with her family, traveling, and golfing. She loves going to sporting events and concerts.

applicable_locations.post_content:
Nestled in the heart of Carmel’s vibrant health-and-wellness corridor at 10485 Pennsylvania Street, our new RELUXE Med Spa location brings you the same elevated experience you know and love—now closer to Fishers, Zionsville, and North Indianapolis. Housed alongside our friends at House of Health, this space is designed as a true wellness destination: step through our doors into a serene, light-filled treatment lounge, then explore cutting-edge aesthetics or seamlessly transition into the comprehensive medical therapies offered next door.

In collaboration with House of Health, we’ve created an integrated care ecosystem where advanced aesthetic treatments and holistic well-being services work in perfect harmony. Whether you’re here for a laser hair-removal session or a rejuvenating facial, you’ll also have access to chiropractic care, therapeutic massage, nutritional counseling, and more—no extra stop required. Our shared reception and thoughtfully appointed lounges make referrals and cross-service scheduling effortless, so your journey from “treat myself” to “treat the whole me” is as streamlined as it is luxurious.

At RELUXE Carmel, every detail is curated for your comfort and results: choose from our signature injectables, personalized skincare plans, or innovative body-contouring treatments; then, if you’d like to complement your aesthetic goals with deeper wellness support, the House of Health team is right next door. Together, we’re redefining what it means to look—and feel—exceptionally well, all under one roof.

Nestled just off US 32 at 514 E State Road 32—only minutes from US 31 and Grand Park—our flagship RELUXE Med Spa in Westfield blends accessibility with an elevated experience. From the moment you pull into our convenient parking, you’ll be welcomed by warm, modern décor and a concierge-style reception, setting the tone for an experience that’s as relaxing as it is results-driven.

Inside, discover our full suite of services organized under the RELUXE acronym:

  • Rejuvenate: Custom facials and SkinPen treatments tailored to reveal your healthiest glow.
  • Enhance: Industry-leading injectables (Jeuveau, Botox, FLATTOX™) delivered by our skilled NP and RN injectors.
  • Laser: Unlimited laser hair removal, IPL, ClearLift®, and Morpheus8 to refine and revitalize.
  • Unwind: Therapeutic massage modalities—Swedish, deep tissue, Thai, and Gua Sha—each customizable with your choice of oils and add-ons.
  • Exfoliate: Chemical peels and microdermabrasion to smooth, brighten, and resurface.
  • Elevate: Premium retail from Skinbetter Science, Skinceuticals, CBD+, and Rhonda Allison for at-home care.

As our original flagship location, Westfield is home to our most experienced team—each provider committed to personalized treatment plans and continuity of care. Whether this is your first visit or you’re a loyal member, expect seamless scheduling, member-only perks like complimentary add-ons, and follow-up that keeps you on track. At RELUXE Westfield, flagship service isn’t just a promise—it’s our everyday standard.

acf.offer_short_description: Save $1 off every unit of Dysport in August when you get 80+ units
